extendedInfo.description: A simple, configurable dice roller. Intended for RPGs such as Dungeons and Dragons but can be used for any game that requires dice.Dice Bag is a free, fully featured, zero advertisement application. Built for the serious gamer who prefers customization and features over pretty colors. Players and GMs can pre-program all their rolls in advance and never interrupt the flow of battle by looking up exact damage or hit bonuses.Its intention is not to replace the fun and excitement of real dice. Instead DiceBag provides an alternative when dice get forgotten or misplaced. Also great for that spontaneous session. Current features include:- Result history log.- Profiles for different characters/games.- Custom dice types for n-sided dice.- Options such as exploding, drop lowest, penetrating, brutal and keep dice.- Dice Combinations.- Profile and Dice exporting and importing

reviews.title: Best dice out there
reviews.comment: Out of all the dice rollers out there I\'ve seen and tried. This one by far is the best.  I love the profiles, it easily let\'s me switch characters and have all my skills with bonus at my finger tips.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Works great! Being able to customize profiles and have them ready for dming is great. Makes it very quick and easy to use. :)
reviews.author: Matthew Gagliano

reviews.title: What an app should be
reviews.comment: Simple, intuitive, easy to use let alone a great dice roller. The people who wrote this app should be proud. Only caveat if any is going two screens deep in the custom rolls. Perhaps bring brutal, and the other dice types to the first option page.
reviews.author: Chazz Trott

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: Very configurable with most common roll mechanics supported. Simple straightforward ui. Target count with Exploding dice isn\'t working for me, but the help file warns that it\'s an untested feature, so I\'m working around it for WoD. Please consider this a request.
reviews.author: Christopher Hekman

reviews.title: Great UI
reviews.comment: Works great & easy to organize. Only issue is custom dice types: I can create them, but not use or add them to profiles.
reviews.author: Lori Candido

reviews.title: I\'ve been looking!
reviews.comment: Ok, so I have been looking for a Dice roller that can work with a few games and have saved files. This dice roller does just that. I can save my dice and make new saves for other games. From D20 to Cyberpunk. It works well for both. Love it!
reviews.author: Chris Clevenger

reviews.title: Great dice roller
reviews.comment: This has all the features I was looking for except one.... Could you please add a screen lock, so we have the option to keep the screen from timing out? Other then that, this is easily the best dice roller available!
reviews.author: Mike Rainbolt

reviews.title: Best custom dice
reviews.comment: There aren\'t enough good things to say about this program. Custom profiles with custom dice, saved rolls, everything is easy to use and intuitive. I\'d give this 6 stars if I could... better than literally everything for iOS.
reviews.author: Adam Luopa

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I spent an entire evening testing dice rolling apps to use with our Pathfinder game.  I like this one the best.  I have been using it for several months now.  The profiles and programable dice are fantastic.  I have all my attacks and skills programed in for several different characters in several different game systems.
reviews.author: Lena Erickson

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Love the application and use it while GMing for rolling for random loot. Works like a charm as a backup for impromptu gaming nights with its stored dice rolls with names.
reviews.author: Matt Kava

reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
reviews.comment: I love this app so much. It does exactly what I want without silly dice animations. The only thing that I could possibly ask for is the ability to do more than add/subtract whole numbers. Often I find myself needing to multiply decimal numbers.  I do wholly recommend this app for your dice rolling needs.
reviews.author: Jason Beardsley

reviews.title: Fan-TASTIC.
reviews.comment: This is probably the best dice roller system I\'ve ever used. It\'s come in handy many times over the months of our Star Wars game, the DM swears by it, and at least two players have commented that, most of the time, they only bust out the real dice when it\'s actually time to play- otherwise they generally use this for their dicing needs. Strikes me as high praise.
reviews.author: Kenneth Rohrbacher

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic app.   I am hopeless when it comes  to doing the math after rolling the dice, and this app saves the day.   Though  I gave it 4 stars, it could be bumped to 5 if one simple feature were added.  I would love it if this app would display a critical roll of 20 before modifiers in red,  as I often miss that.  And a critical  fail of 1 before modifiers in blue.   This would make this app truly awesome!
reviews.author: Brett Taylor

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: I host VnV and this is very handy for rolling random characters and keeping track of players attacks, bonuses and hit rolls. When I stumbled upon this I was simply looking for an app that let me roll with a tap instead of physically rolling every time, as many rolls are not ment for players eyes but this app does so much more. I thank the developers for making this. My only suggestion is that you make an app that allows you to record tables and formulas for games also. That would be awsome. Great app tho
reviews.author: Kyle Rom

reviews.title: Excellent!bf
reviews.comment: This app rocks! Me and my friends use it when gaming. What I would love to see is the ability to add or subtract a die roll from a predetermined number. Ie: (27 - 1d20).
reviews.author: Johnny Casady

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it. I\'ve tried lots of different dice rollers, this one is the best by far.
reviews.author: Paul Turner

reviews.title: Functional
reviews.comment: This app is well made and functional, thanks for the good work! The results of rolling are not well displayed however. In the log, the outcome should be listed first and in a clearly distinct font (e.g. bold) so that when I\'m running a game I can see the outcome at a glance.
reviews.author: David Little

reviews.title: I love this program!
reviews.comment: Simple and conveniant with no ads at all. With easy controls this application has pretty much replaced my bag of dice. It\'s worth downloading.
reviews.author: Christopher Roberts

reviews.title: Perfect for the tabletop
reviews.comment: Great app.  Especially the ability to have profiles of custom dice for multiple characters.
reviews.author: Jason Brown

reviews.title: Used to be good
reviews.comment: Used to be a good program but now it stops working and needs to be forced closed. Uninstalling untill its fixed! Used to be a 5 star program. Now I wouldn\'t give it 1/2 a star..
reviews.author: A Google User
